title: Annotation
description: Information about the Annotation data model. This model has been based on the W3C Web Annotation model

@id.description: The unique identifier (handle) of the Annotation object

@type.description: The type of the object, in this case ods:Annotation

ods:ID.description: The handle of the annotation. It is a unique identifier for the annotation. It is composed of the handle of the document followed by a slash and a unique identifier for the annotation.

ods:status.description: The status of the Digital Object.

ods:jobID.description: Handle of the job record, if the annotation was produced by a Machine Annotation Service, only filled when annotation was created by a MAS

rdf:type.description: The type of the annotation. It is always ods:Annotation. https://www.w3.org/TR/rdf12-schema/#ch_type

ods:version.description: The version of the object, each change generates a new version

oa:motivation.description: The motivation for the annotation. Based on a selection of https://www.w3.org/TR/annotation-model/#motivation-and-purpose. The motivation ods:adding is added for DiSSCo's purposes.

oa:motivatedBy.description: Describes the reason for the annotation. https://www.w3.org/TR/annotation-vocab/#motivatedby

oa:hasTarget.description: Indicates the particular object and part of the object on which the annotation has been made.

@id.description: This is the PID of the target object. Valid targets are the Digital Specimen, Digital Media Object or another annotation.

@type.description: The type of the target object

ods:ID.description: This is the PID of the target object. Valid targets are the Digital Specimen, Digital Media Object or another annotation.

ods:type.description: This is the handle to the type of the target object.

oa:hasSelector.description: Optional field to indicate the part of the target object that is being annotated. It can be a field, a class or a region of interest.

@type.description: A selector for an individual field.

ods:field.description: The full jsonPath of the field being annotated. Following: https://goessner.net/articles/JsonPath/index.html#e2

@type.description: A selector for an individual class.

ods:class.description: The full jsonPath of the class being annotated. Following: https://goessner.net/articles/JsonPath/index.html#e2

@type.description: A selector for an specific Region of Interest (Roi). Only applicable on media objects.

oa:hasBody.description: The body of the annotation contains the specific value of the annotation

oa:value.description: An array of multiple values in string representation specific for the particular selector

items.description: The textual content of the body. This could be a simple string value for commenting or editing of a single field. It could also be the string representation of the json for a class

dcterms:references.description: Indicates how the value came to be. https://purl.org/dc/terms/references

ods:score.description: A score between 0 and 1 indicating the confidence in the value. 1 is the highest confidence and 0 is the lowest.

dcterms:created.description: The date and time when the annotation was created. https://purl.org/dc/terms/created

dcterms:issued.description: The date and time when the annotation was generated. https://purl.org/dc/terms/issued

as:generator.description: Object containing information on who generated the object. Generated is here seen as who stored/indexed the object. In most case this will be the annotation-processing-service. Contains an ods:Agent object.

schema:AggregateRating.description: The average rating based on multiple ratings or reviews

@type.description: Indicates which type of aggregateRating we are using.

schema:ratingCount.description: The count of total number of ratings. https://schema.org/ratingCount

schema:ratingValue.description: The rating for the content. https://schema.org/ratingValue

ods:batchID.description: Internally generated PID to identify the batch the annotation was generated by

ods:mergingDecisionStatus.description: The merging status of the annotation. Only present when motivation is ods:adding or oa:editing

ods:mergingStateChangeDate.description: The date and time when the annotation was merging state was changed. Only present when motivation is ods:adding or oa:editing

ods:MergingStateChangedBy.description: Object containing information on who changed the merging state of the annotation. Only present when motivation is ods:adding or oa:editing. Contains an ods:Agent object.

ods:TombstoneMetadata.description: Object containing the tombstone metadata of the object. Only present when ods:status is ods:Tombstone
